metadata.name: TAKE ME HOME WHERE YOUR HEART BEATS
metadata.description:
Her voice still haunts me. It seems as if she is always and always present. When will it finally stop? I can neither sleep nor eat nor devote myself to my art in peace. 

This painting is the first of a long series of painful experiences of my existence. Sometimes life is not fair, but we should never let it get us down, because it only makes us stronger.

Information:
- 2000x2500
- .jpg
- 11 MB
